  1. Just a fun, quick experiment with responsive headlines using flexbox (no JavaScript). Letters are spaced to fit to an arbitrary container width and each line varies only by font-size. codepen.io/zachleat/full/NXRLvV/ Kinda looks like a vision test 👀
